attrs.script:
#escript aci_create_ap

#variables
aci_apic_ip = '@@{aci_apic_ip}@@'
aci_apic_username = '@@{aci_user.username}@@'
aci_apic_password = '@@{aci_user.secret}@@'
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
aci_tenant_name = '@@{aci_tenant_name}@@'
aci_ap_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-' + '@@{HAL_application_name}@@' + '-app_profile'
dn = "uni/tn-" + aci_tenant_name + "/ap-" + aci_ap_name

#REST call: login and get a cookie
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/aaaLogin.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"aaaUser":{"attributes":{"name":aci_apic_username,"pwd":aci_apic_password}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
aci_cookie= response.cookies

#REST call: POST application profile (in tenant)
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/node/mo/' + dn + '.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = { "fvAp": { "attributes": { "annotation": "", "childAction": "", "descr": "", "dn": dn, "name": aci_ap_name, "nameAlias": "", "ownerKey": "", "ownerTag": "", "status": "created,modified", "prio": "unspecified" } } }
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False, cookies=aci_cookie)
r = json.loads(response.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(response.status_code))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(response.content)))

#escript aci_create_bd

#variables
aci_apic_ip = '@@{aci_apic_ip}@@'
aci_apic_username = '@@{aci_user.username}@@'
aci_apic_password = '@@{aci_user.secret}@@'
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
aci_tenant_name = '@@{aci_tenant_name}@@'
aci_bd_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-bridge_domain'
dn = "uni/tn-" + aci_tenant_name + "/BD-" + aci_bd_name

#REST call: login and get a cookie
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/aaaLogin.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"aaaUser":{"attributes":{"name":aci_apic_username,"pwd":aci_apic_password}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
aci_cookie= response.cookies

#REST call: POST bridge domain (in tenant)
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/node/mo/' + dn + '.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"fvBD": {"attributes": {"OptimizeWanBandwidth": "no","annotation": "","arpFlood": "no","descr": "","dn": dn,"epClear": "no","epMoveDetectMode": "", "status": "created,modified", "intersiteBumTrafficAllow": "no", "intersiteL2Stretch": "no", "ipLearning": "yes", "limitIpLearnToSubnets": "yes", "llAddr": "::", "mcastAllow": "no", "multiDstPktAct": "bd-flood", "name": aci_bd_name, "nameAlias": "", "ownerKey": "", "ownerTag": "", "type": "regular", "unicastRoute": "yes", "unkMacUcastAct": "proxy", "unkMcastAct": "flood", "vmac": "not-applicable" }}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False, cookies=aci_cookie)
r = json.loads(response.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(response.status_code))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(response.content)))

#escript aci_create_epg

#variables
aci_apic_ip = '@@{aci_apic_ip}@@'
aci_apic_username = '@@{aci_user.username}@@'
aci_apic_password = '@@{aci_user.secret}@@'
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
aci_tenant_name = '@@{aci_tenant_name}@@'
aci_ap_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-' + '@@{HAL_application_name}@@' + '-app_profile'
aci_epg_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-' + '@@{HAL_application_name}@@' + '-' + '@@{HAL_application_tier}@@' + '-EPG'
aci_bd_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-bridge_domain'
dn = "uni/tn-" + aci_tenant_name + "/ap-" + aci_ap_name + "/epg-" + aci_epg_name
rn = "epg-" + aci_epg_name

#REST call: login and get a cookie
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/aaaLogin.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"aaaUser":{"attributes":{"name":aci_apic_username,"pwd":aci_apic_password}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
aci_cookie= response.cookies

#REST call: POST endpoint group with bridge domain association (in tenant)
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/node/mo/' + dn + '.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = { "fvAEPg": { "attributes": { "dn": dn, "name": aci_epg_name, "rn": rn, "status": "created,modified" }, "children": [ { "fvRsBd": { "attributes": { "tnFvBDName": aci_bd_name, "status": "created,modified" }, "children": [] } } ] } }
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False, cookies=aci_cookie)
r = json.loads(response.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(response.status_code))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(response.content)))

#escript aci_create_sbunet

#variables
aci_apic_ip = '@@{aci_apic_ip}@@'
aci_apic_username = '@@{aci_user.username}@@'
aci_apic_password = '@@{aci_user.secret}@@'
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
aci_tenant_name = '@@{aci_tenant_name}@@'
aci_bd_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-bridge_domain'
aci_subnet = '@@{subnet}@@'
dn = "uni/tn-" + aci_tenant_name + "/BD-" + aci_bd_name + "/subnet-[" + aci_subnet + "]"

#REST call: login and get a cookie
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/aaaLogin.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"aaaUser":{"attributes":{"name":aci_apic_username,"pwd":aci_apic_password}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
aci_cookie= response.cookies

#REST call: POST subnet (in bridge domain)
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/node/mo/' + dn + '.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = { "fvSubnet": { "attributes": { "annotation": "", "childAction": "", "ctrl": "", "descr": "", "dn": dn, "ip": aci_subnet, "name": "", "nameAlias": "", "preferred": "no", "scope": "private", "status": "created,modified", "virtual": "no" }}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False, cookies=aci_cookie)
r = json.loads(response.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(response.status_code))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(response.content)))

#escript aci_create_tenant

#variables
aci_apic_ip = '@@{aci_apic_ip}@@'
aci_apic_username = '@@{aci_user.username}@@'
aci_apic_password = '@@{aci_user.secret}@@'
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
aci_tenant_name = '@@{aci_tenant_name}@@'
rn = "tn-" + aci_tenant_name
dn = "uni/" + rn

#REST call: login and get a cookie
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/aaaLogin.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"aaaUser":{"attributes":{"name":aci_apic_username,"pwd":aci_apic_password}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
aci_cookie= response.cookies

#REST call: POST tenant
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/node/mo/uni/' + rn + '.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"fvTenant":{"attributes":{"dn":dn,"name":aci_tenant_name,"rn":rn,"status":"created,modified"},"children":[]}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False, cookies=aci_cookie)
r = json.loads(response.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(response.status_code))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(response.content)))

#escript aci_create_vrf

#variables
aci_apic_ip = '@@{aci_apic_ip}@@'
aci_apic_username = '@@{aci_user.username}@@'
aci_apic_password = '@@{aci_user.secret}@@'
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
aci_tenant_name = '@@{aci_tenant_name}@@'
aci_vrf_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@'
dn = "uni/tn-" + aci_tenant_name + "/ctx-" + aci_vrf_name

#REST call: login and get a cookie
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/aaaLogin.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"aaaUser":{"attributes":{"name":aci_apic_username,"pwd":aci_apic_password}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
aci_cookie= response.cookies

#REST call: POST VRF (in tenant)
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/node/mo/' + dn + '.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"fvCtx": {"attributes": {"annotation": "","bdEnforcedEnable": "no","childAction": "","descr": "","dn": dn,"knwMcastAct": "permit","name": aci_vrf_name,"nameAlias": "","ownerKey": "","ownerTag": "","pcEnfDir": "ingress","status": "created,modified","pcEnfPref": "enforced"}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False, cookies=aci_cookie)
r = json.loads(response.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(response.status_code))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(response.content)))

#escript aci_create_vmmdomain-to-epg-association

#variables
aci_apic_ip = '@@{aci_apic_ip}@@'
aci_apic_username = '@@{aci_user.username}@@'
aci_apic_password = '@@{aci_user.secret}@@'
headers = {'content-type': 'application/json'}
aci_tenant_name = '@@{aci_tenant_name}@@'
aci_ap_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-' + '@@{HAL_application_name}@@' + '-app_profile'
aci_epg_name = '@@{HAL_project_id}@@' + '-' + '@@{HAL_application_name}@@' + '-' + '@@{HAL_application_tier}@@' + '-EPG'
aci_vmm_domain = '@@{dvswitch}@@'
dn = "uni/tn-" + aci_tenant_name + "/ap-" + aci_ap_name + "/epg-" + aci_epg_name
tDn = "uni/vmmp-VMware/dom-" + aci_vmm_domain

#REST call: login and get a cookie
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/aaaLogin.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = {"aaaUser":{"attributes":{"name":aci_apic_username,"pwd":aci_apic_password}}}
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
aci_cookie= response.cookies

#REST call: POST associate EPG to VMM Domain (in tenant)
base_url = 'https://' + aci_apic_ip + '/api/node/mo/' + dn + '.json'
create_rm_url = base_url
payload = { "fvRsDomAtt": { "attributes": { "resImedcy": "immediate", "tDn": tDn, "status": "created,modified" }, "children": [] } }
response = urlreq(create_rm_url, verb="POST",params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False, cookies=aci_cookie)
r = json.loads(response.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(response.status_code))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(response.content)))

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop
